name: Ray
description: An Aakhen military doctor who dreams of reformation
story: A young nobleman who joined the army after an argument with his father, who believes that medical treatment should only be provided to nobles who can pay. Ray dreams of a world in which those who are less fortunate can receive the medical treatment they need.
get_line: Do you have any patients for me? Hmm... You don't look so well yourself.

relations.description: Elena, the high priestess of Constella. She seems to be caught up in something serious.

upgrade.description: A cute and kind young lady, Elena will often give Ray a hand or help financially with gifts, presumably in return for his help in Constella.

relations.description: A cute and kind young lady, Elena will often give Ray a hand or help financially with gifts, presumably in return for his help in Constella.
Becoming friends by chance, Lena put her own life aside to help Ray when he needed it, and for that he will always be thankful.

upgrade.description: A friend of Ray's who comes to mind whenever he has to deal with hard work. He wonders if she is doing well and has achieved her goal.

relations.description: A friend of Ray's who comes to mind whenever he has to deal with hard work. He wonders if she is doing well and has achieved her goal.
The dogmatic and conservative citylord of Aakhen. Ray knows that many were and will continue to be sacrificed because of him.
Ray wants to be good friends with Cerise, but he knows that as long as Furious is citylord, he won't get the chance.

specialty.name: Bright Energy
specialty.description: He is always surrounded by a refreshing air that alleviates pain and illness.

type.name: Weakened
type.description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.

skills.name: Light of Rebirth
skills.description: Radiates light upon all allies, granting a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the ally's max Health.
skills.enhanced_description: Radiates light upon all allies, recovering Health and granting a barrier for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the ally's max Health.

buffs.name: Immune
buffs.effect: Unaffected by debuffs and some harmful effects.

buffs.name: Barrier
buffs.effect: Neutralizes some of the damage taken when attacked.

skill1.name: 劇薬処方
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、味方単体の弱体効果を1つ解除する。

skill2.name: 再生の光
skill2.desc: 味方全体にシールドを2ターンの間付与する。対象の最大生命力が高いほどシールド効果がUPする。

skill3.name: 活力の光輝
skill3.desc: 味方全体の弱体効果をすべて解除し、弱体効果免疫を2ターンの間付与し、生命力を回復する。対象の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。
skill3.soul_description: 味方全体の弱体効果をすべて解除し、弱体効果免疫を2ターンの間付与し、生命力を回復する。対象の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。
